column2: "...Well done, Hitsugi Yasaka. You saved the catalyst... saved Aru."
"No, not just that... You even managed to rip away the elements of Dark Falz... you've set us free."
"Then, there's only one thing left to be done. Slay me, with that blade. Everything will be as it should."
"And my eternal loneliness will finally end."
"Oh, that's right... That was my desire. Now I can finally..."
"...That hurt, Hitsugi Yasaka."
"Of course it did, that was the point."
"Mother, tell me. Why did you invite all these lonely people to join Mother Cluster?"
"I was lonely, and so was Kohri. I'm sure that Och and Phul were too. Even Hagith and Bethor had no one."
"Everyone was like that... Everyone was lonely."
"That was... nothing more than a rational decision to increase their dependence on me."
"But... I was happy when you did. I was truly happy, that someone who needed me existed."
"Mother is like that too, right? You don't really want revenge, just acknowledgement."
"To say \"I am here\". You just wanted someone to notice you..."
"Ah, ha... Amazing, to create such an emotional story using nothing more than a guess."
"Actually, I have a proper reason."
"Xiera told us. She said that Photons and Ether have the same origin."
"But here, Photons transformed into Ether. Transformed into something specializing in communication... into technology specialized for connecting with others."
"That's because the origin of Ether, Mother... Because you desired connection more than anyone else... right?"
"...So what? What would that change?"
"I just wanted to make them see. Make those who declared me useless see that I wasn't and acknowledge me."
"But, my target no longer exists! No matter how strong I look, or how much I show off... My goal was impossible from the start!"
"If that's the case, just find a new goal!"
"Find a new goal...? Isn't it too late for me?"
"You've been asleep for billions of years, but now you're taking about \"it's too late\"? Things take time, no matter what it is!"
"What I'm trying to say is... don't be in such a rush!"
"I'm not telling you to forget what happened. I'm still pissed at you, and I want to get back at Kohri for cutting me down."
"But, there were people who needed you. That's a indisputable fact, Mother."
"Thanks to you, those people were saved. My past self... and Kohri too."
"That's why we'll go home and rethink everything."
"Think about all kinds of stuff, and talk about it, and if you still want to take revenge..."
"Just tell me, anytime. I'll help you cut down those angry thoughts every time with Ame-no-Murakumo!"
"Now, enough of this... Let's go home. I did come here promising to save everyone, after all!"
"...Heh. You've become quite persuasive, Hitsugi Yasaka."
"Sorry, I was born and raised this way."
"Let's go home, Mother. All together."
"You were right, about all of it..."
"All I needed was... to have these connections."
